p.n: The Adventure Of A.R.I.: My Robot Friend
p.k: After repairing a broken robot, a teenager must help his new friend escape the clutches of a ruthless CEO who wants to turn him into a weapon
After going through a messy break-up with her high-school boyfriend of two years, April mends her heartbreak by striking up an unlikely friendship with his new girlfriend
51% A man with no recollection of who he is or where he came from must piece together clues from his past while dodging the dangerous figures that relentlessly chase him
Unlock your imagination as a young orphan discovers a magical garden when she's sent to live on her uncle's estate. Colin Firth stars

p.n: Black British Cinema: The Top Ten Show
p.k: Celebrate Black History Month with a countdown of 10 top British films starring incredible Black talent
71% A woman believes her abusive ex's suicide was faked. Can she prove she's still being hunted? Sci-fi horror with Elisabeth Moss
Thriller based on a true story that lead to the first conviction for murder of an FBI agent. Game of Thrones' Emilia Clarke stars
